name: Mona
description: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful. Though she is often strapped for cash and lives a life of thrift, she is resolved to never use astrology for profit... It is this very resolution that has caused her to constantly fret about money.

skills.name: Ripple of Fate
skills.description:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.

Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.
Plunging Attack: Gathering the might of Hydro, Mona plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Mirror Reflection of Doom
skills.description:
Creates an illusory Phantom of fate from coalesced waterspouts.

The Phantom has the following special properties:

  • Continuously taunts nearby opponents, attracting their fire.
  • Each second, 4 times, deals AoE Hydro DMG.
  • When its duration expires, the Phantom explodes, dealing AoE Hydro DMG.

Hold: Utilizes water currents to move backwards swiftly before conjuring a Phantom
Only one Phantom created by Mirror Reflection of Doom can exist at any time.
When the Phantom explodes and hits at least one opponent, it generates 3 elemental particles.

skills.name: Illusory Torrent
skills.description:
Alternate Sprint: Mona cloaks herself within the water's flow, consuming stamina to move rapidly.

When under the effect of Illusory Torrent, Mona can move at high speed on water.
Applies the Wet status to nearby opponents when she reappears.

skills.name: Stellaris Phantasm
skills.description:
Mona summons the sparkling waves and creates a reflection of the starry sky, applying the Illusory Bubble status to the opponents in a large AoE.

Illusory Bubble: Traps opponents inside a pocket of destiny and also makes them Wet. Renders weaker opponents immobile. When an opponent affected by Illusory Bubble sustains DMG, it has the following effects:

  • Applies an Omen to the opponent, which gives a DMG Bonus, also increasing the DMG of the attack that causes it.
  • Removes the Illusory Bubble, dealing Hydro DMG in the process.

Omen: During its duration, increases DMG taken by opponents.

passives.name: Come 'n' Get Me, Hag!
passives.description:
After she has used Illusory Torrent for 2s, if there are any opponents nearby, Mona will automatically create a Phantom.

A Phantom created in this manner lasts for 2s, and its explosion DMG is equal to 50% of Mirror Reflection of Doom.

passives.name: Waterborne Destiny
passives.description: Increases Mona's Hydro DMG Bonus by a degree equivalent to 20% of her Energy Recharge rate.

passives.name: Principium of Astrology
passives.description: When Mona crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 25% chance to refund one count of one material out of all the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Submersion
constellations.description:
The effects of Hydro-related Elemental Reactions are enhanced for 8s after any of your characters in the party hit an opponent affected by an Omen:
Electro-Charged DMG is increased by 15%.
Vaporize DMG is increased by 15%.
Hydro Swirl DMG is increased by 15%.
The duration for which enemies are Frozen is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Lunar Chain
constellations.description: When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Restless Revolution
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Stellaris Phantasm by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Oblivion
constellations.description: When any character in the party attacks an opponent affected by the Omen status effect, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Mockery of Fortuna
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Mirror Reflection of Doom by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rhetorics of Calamitas
constellations.description: Upon entering Illusory Torrent, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG her next Charged Attack per second of movement. A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.
